description: Given a doubly linked list where nodes have an additional child pointer that may point to another doubly linked list, flatten all levels into a single-level doubly linked list. The child list should be inserted after the current node and before the current node's next. After flattening, all child pointers should be null.

examples.explanation: Node 3 has a child list starting at 7. Node 8 has a child list starting at 11. Flatten recursively by DFS/iteration.
Node 1 has a child pointer to 3. Insert child list after node 1.

constraints: The number of nodes in the list is in the range [0, 1000]
The depth of nesting is at most 1000
